_header: Father and Son and Holy Ghost / Lord to Thee I cry and call
Note: This poem has been incorporated into 3918, beginning at line 9.
Subjects: Trinity, prayers to; prayers, to Trinity
_description: A prayer to the Trinity — thirteen 8-line stanzas

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
FAdur and Sone and HoligostLord to þe I crie and
                    calle…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…On þe to seo þat swete sihtffadur and Sone and
                    Holigost. AMEN.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Here biginneþ an orisun of þe trinite (f.
                    114rb)

BLAdd37787.First Lines:
Fadur & sone & holy gostLord to þe I cri and
                    calle
BLAdd37787.Last Lines:
…On þe to se þe swete sihtffadur & sone &
                    holi gost. Amen.

Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,

Lincoln91.First Lines:
Fadir and sonne And haly gasteLorde to þe I make my
                    moneStedfaste kyng of myghtes masteAlle weldand gode sittand in
                    trone…
Lincoln91.Last Lines:
…One þe to see þat ioyfull syghteffadir and Sonne
                    And þe haly gaste Amen
Lincoln91.Note: Stanzas 1-2 of six lines only; 3-13 of eight lines.
